dcterms:description: A publicly available LGE CMR database consisting of 150 clinical exams containing healthy patients and patients with myocardial infarction. Each exam includes a series of LGE CMR images in short axis orientation covering the left ventricle, with ground truth segmentation masks provided for training.
dcterms:title: EMIDEC dataset

dcterms:description: The dataset used for the EMIDEC challenge, which includes a variety of LGE CMR images for the automatic evaluation of myocardial infarction. It provides ground truth segmentation masks for training and testing deep learning methods.
dcterms:title: EMIDEC challenge dataset
